column1: #text=I wanted something interesting to read as I have several days with no plans starting this weekend .
#text=I enjoy various types of books but wanted something really different so I decided to go with a good science fiction and something that was rated well by reviewers .
#text=I found what I wanted online and drove to the library .
#text=I asked the librarian where the sci fi section was and showed me .
#text=Before looking for the one I wanted I browsed the books and saw several that looked interesting .
#text=I opened one in particular and starting going through it .
#text=I then looked for the book I came to borrow and eventually found it .
#text=Remarkably it had the same author as the previous book I had selected .
#text=I must have great taste in books .
#text=I brought both books to the front desk and checked them out .
#text=I was very pleased with the library and quite happy to have more than one book to look forward to reading .
